channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A24's 10 Best Sci-Fi Movies, Ranked
item.description: A24 doesn’t release too many sci-fi movies, but the studio has still delivered a few modern classics, including Ex Machina and Under the Skin.

item.title: After Spider-Man: Brand New Day's Title Reveal, I'm Convinced These 8 Marvel Villains Would Be Perfect For The MCU Movie
item.description: The reveal of Spider-Man: Brand New Day's title highlights potential plot points for the upcoming MCU movies, including which villains should feature.

item.title: Forget The All-Valley And The Sekai Taikai, Karate Kid Has A New Main Tournament
item.description: Karate Kid: Legends' new tournament could be the start of a new legacy, as it raises the stakes by delving into uncharted martial arts ground.
